H0.text: Which movie won the Oscar for Best Film at the 2013 Academy Award ceremony . Lincoln

H1.text: Which movie won the Oscar for Best Film at the 2013 Academy Award ceremony . Django Unchained

H2.text: Which movie won the Oscar for Best Film at the 2013 Academy Award ceremony . Zero Dark Thirty

H3.text: Which movie won the Oscar for Best Film at the 2013 Academy Award ceremony . ARGO

A4.text: Argo won three awards, including Best Picture, the first film to win an Academy Award for Best Picture without its director nominated since Driving Miss Daisy.
